# valueDidChangeHandler

**Instance Property**

The block that the input object calls when the value changes.

## Declaration

```swift
var valueDidChangeHandler: ((any GCPhysicalInputElement, any GCAxisInput, Float) -> Void)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The block’s parameters are:



## Getting the value

- **value**: The value along the axis, in unit coordinates.
- **lastValueTimestamp**: The time of the most recent value change.
- **lastValueLatency**: The time in seconds between the last value change and the current time.
